query:
UPDATE services.harvests harvest
            SET finished = true,
                images = NULL,
                finished_at = $1

            WHERE harvest.location_id IN (
                SELECT location_.id
                FROM services.active_locations location_
                WHERE location_.farm_id = $2
            )
            AND NOT(
                harvest.available_at > $1 OR
                harvest.created_at > $3
            )
